data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Yachats Beach 15m, Oregon, USA (YB15XX)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Yachats Beach 15m, Oregon, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a HOBO U12 Themocouple Logger (Onset Computer Corp. U12-014) beginning 2008-05-15. The instrument depth was 004 meters, in an overall water depth of 15 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
